body: Ok I fixed it. I had to move `impl_` to the top of the class, otherwise I can't use it in the trailing return type of the methods. TIL!
body_html: Ok I fixed it. I had to move impl_ to the top of the class, otherwise I can't use it in the trailing return type of the methods. TIL!
